Welcome to Epidemics on Networks's documentation!
=================================================


**Invasion_PGF**  is a Python module that provides tools to study 
the spread of invasive processes.  

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   Invasion_PGF

Highlights
----------

**Invasion_PGF** is based on the tutorial 

 `A tutorial on the use of probability generating functions in infectious disease modeling`_
by Miller.  The repository_ is on github.   


.. _repository: https://github.com/joelmiller/Invasion_PGF
.. _A tutorial on the use of probability generating functions in infectious disease modeling: Not_yet_published
